bioghist.head: Biographical/Historical Information
bioghist.p: American writer, 1888-1944, known for historical novels, particularly Drums, Bitter Creek, and Roll River.

did.unittitle: James Boyd to Robert Bridges 1927 December 5

scopecontent.p: Boyd sends a war tale and acknowledges that it is longer than Bridges wanted. He hopes it is worth more than he offered. He is waiting to hear what Bridges thinks of it.

did.unittitle: Robert Bridges to James Boyd 1927 December 8

scopecontent.p: Bridges says there is no doubt about Humoresque. He likes the characterization and is glad to have it for the magazine. He will pay $400.
